unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather and yields, always a gamble, no? Like betting on the monsoon in Rajasthan. Remember 2020? Total loss! This year, 2024, hoping for better. My khet near Pune depends on it. Grandma always said, "Puja at 06:00 hrs sharp!" Maybe that'll help. Even IARI can't predict like that, 15/08/1947 changed nothing! Rs. 5000 down the drain last time. Let's see what 25/12/2024 brings.
normalised: Arre yaar, weather and yields, always a gamble, no? Like betting on the monsoon in Rajasthan. Remember two thousand and twenty? Total loss! This year, two thousand and twenty four, hoping for better. My khet near Pune depends on it. Grandma always said, "Puja at six hundred hours sharp!" Maybe that will help. Even I A R I can't predict like that, fifteenth August nineteen forty seven changed nothing! Rupees five thousand down the drain last time. Let's see what twenty fifth December two thousand and twenty four brings.
text: Arre yaar, weather and yields, always a gamble, no? Like betting on the monsoon in Rajasthan. Remember 2020? Total loss! This year, 2024, hoping for better. My khet near Pune depends on it. Grandma always said, "Puja at 06:00 hrs sharp!" Maybe that'll help. Even IARI can't predict like that, 15/08/1947 changed nothing! Rs. 5000 down the drain last time. Let's see what 25/12/2024 brings.
odia: ଆରେ ୟାର୍, ପାଣିପାଗ ଏବଂ ଉତ୍ପାଦନ, ସର୍ବଦା ଏକ ଜୁଆ, ନୁହେଁ କି? ରାଜସ୍ଥାନରେ ମୌସୁମୀ ଉପରେ ବାଜି ଲଗାଇବା ପରି। ୨୦୨୦ ମନେ ଅଛି? ସମ୍ପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ କ୍ଷତି! ଏହି ବର୍ଷ, ୨୦୨୪, ଭଲ ହେବ ବୋଲି ଆଶା। ପୁଣେ ନିକଟରେ ଥିବା ମୋର କ୍ଷେତ ଏହା ଉପରେ ନିର୍ଭର କରେ। ଆଈ ମା ସବୁବେଳେ କହୁଥିଲେ, "ଠିକ୍ 06:00 ଘଣ୍ଟାରେ ପୂଜା!" ହୁଏତ ଏହା ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରିପାରେ। ଏପରିକି IARI ମଧ୍ୟ ସେପରି ଭବିଷ୍ୟବାଣୀ କରିପାରିବ ନାହିଁ, 15/08/1947 କିଛି ବଦଳାଇଲା ନାହିଁ! ଗତଥର 5000 ଟଙ୍କା ବର୍ବାଦ ହୋଇଗଲା। ଦେଖାଯାଉ 25/12/2024 କ'ଣ ଆଣୁଛି।
